author: parithosh
content: We have xatu up and running, so we're collecting baseline metrics now. Deneb will go live at epoch 220 (tomorrow). So we'll have 1 day regular gsf, 1 day deneb data before we meet for ACD.

author: parithosh
content: Collecting data from 1 of each combination (EL and CL)

author: parithosh
content: Also just a timeline warning, Since the # of nodes are large and cost being high - we'd like to tear down the shadowfork shortly after ACD. So if there's something people want to try, some data to capture or anything - please reach out earlier rather than later.
